issue.title: [C++] Refactor ArrayBuilder bitmap logic into TypedBufferBuilder<bool>
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-4031](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4031). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
It would be useful to have a specialization of TypedBufferBuilder to simplify building buffers of bits. This could then be utilized by ArrayBuilder (for the null bitmap) and BooleanBuilder (for values)
